# ITextFormatter interface

Interface which allows an object to be seralized/deserialized according to custom rules depending a given file format.

```csharp
public interface ITextFormatter
```

## Members

| name | description |
| --- | --- |
| [Deserialize](ITextFormatter/Deserialize.md)(…) | Deserializes a string and creates a new instance of the specified object. |
| [Serialize](ITextFormatter/Serialize.md)(…) | Serializes an object to a string value using custom rules. |
